blogPost.excerpt: Music Time is built on the Code Time plugin and performs machine learning against a range of music metrics plus productivity data from over 70,000 developers to determine song recommendations.
blogPost.body: Music Time is built on the Code Time plugin and performs machine learning against a range of music metrics plus productivity data from over 70,000 developers to determine song recommendations.
blogPost.title: Music Time for Spotify - Discover the most productive music to listen to as you code.
blogPost.author: Abdelilah Hicham

localize.description: Music Time建立在Code Time插件的基础上，针对一系列的音乐指标和来自7万多名开发者的生产力数据进行机器学习，以确定歌曲推荐。
localize.tagline: 发现最高效的音乐，让你在编码时听得津津有味。

localize.description: Music Time建立在Code Time插件的基礎上，針對一系列的音樂指標和來自7萬多名開發者的生產力數據進行機器學習，以確定歌曲推薦。
localize.tagline: 發現最高效的音樂，讓你在編碼時聽得津津有味。

previous.excerpt: Website peace of mind. Haark keeps track of all of your websites and makes sure you’re the first to know if they’re down. Developers and project teams alike use Haark as their early warning system so they can be on their A-game with clients.
previous.title: Haark - Monitors your sites and notifies you if they're down

localize.description: 网站安心。Haark跟踪你所有的网站，并确保你是第一个知道他们是否下降。开发人员和项目团队都使用Haark作为他们的早期预警系统，因此他们可以在他们的A-game与客户。
localize.tagline: 监控您的网站并在网站瘫痪时通知您。

localize.description: 網站安心。Haark跟蹤你所有的網站，並確保你是第一個知道他們是否下降。開發人員和項目團隊都使用Haark作爲他們的早期預警系統，因此他們可以在他們的A-game與客戶。
localize.tagline: 監控您的網站並在網站癱瘓時通知您。

next.excerpt: People shifting to telegram groups from Whatsapp can now import all their chats easily.
next.title: Whatsapp Chats Importer - Import Whatsapp Group Chats to Telegram.

localize.description: 从Whatsapp转移到telegram群组的人现在可以轻松导入他们所有的聊天记录。
從Whatsapp轉移到telegram羣組的人現在可以輕鬆導入他們所有的聊天記錄。
